name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Power Engineer with 9+ years of experience in software development, specializing in **PowerPlatform**, **PowerPages**, and **C#**. Proficient in **JavaScript** and skilled in **Solution Architecture** with a strong focus on delivering high-quality software solutions. Knowledgeable in Software Testing, Error Analysis, and Documentation, ensuring robust application performance and reliability. Demonstrated leadership in **Team Collaboration** to drive projects to successful completion while also skilled in **Budget Estimation**. Bilingual in German and English, facilitating effective communication in diverse teams.
